Using GIS for invasive species research Anthony Davidson 2019-09-03 1 Overview This respository contains a collection of dynamic programming tools and introductory tutorials for mapping/GIS from the following github repositories: Creating maps in R: A textbook on geocomputational analysis in R MapView 1.1 The objectives generally the objective is to create a landing page and resource of GIS work in R with a particular focus on invasive species dynamics. The current goals under my PhD work is as follows: One: Produce static maps for the first publication of my PhD. Ensure that packages are up to date.
